text: - Reduced renal corticomedullary differentiation - Self-injurious behavior - Short sternum - Sporadic - Supernumerary ribs - Thrombocytopenia - Weak cry - Widely spaced teeth - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database. The frequency of a sign or symptom is usually listed as a rough estimate of the percentage of patients who have that feature. Th
